title: Not able to access league
body: The error message says," League of legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install League alpha." I've clicked on repair three times, still doesn't work, uninstalled league of legends full directory, and reinstalled. Still doesn't work, I need help!

replies.body:
This error usually crops up after something went wrong with the patching or upgrading process. You should be able to resolve this by going into your League directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends) and deleting the **LeagueClient.exe** file. After deleting that file, launch League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) and attempt the upgrade process again.

Let me know if this worked.
